trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: The homarid can breathe air and water.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The homarid makes two claw attacks.

action.name: Claw
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage, and the target is grappled (escape 11). The homarid has two claws, each of which can grapple only one target.

trait.name: Pounce
trait.text: If the kavu moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the kavu can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.
